CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Taking advantage of this aggregation control approach , high - performance PSCs based on PffBT4T-2OD:PC71BM were fabricated affording a PCE of up to 10.8% .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSCs |
| PffBT4T-2OD |
| PC71BM |

Explanation:

* PSCs: Stands for "Perovskite Solar Cells," which is a type of material used in solar cell technology.
* PffBT4T-2OD: This is a type of polymer used in organic electronics and photovoltaics.
* PC71BM: This is a fullerene derivative used as an electron transport layer in organic solar cells.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBT4T-2OD |
| PC71BM |

Explanation:

* PffBT4T-2OD: This is a type of polymer used in organic electronics and photovoltaics.
* PC71BM: This is a fullerene derivative used as an electron transport layer in organic solar cells.

The other entity, PSCs, stands for "Perovskite Solar Cells," which is a type of device or system rather than a specific material. Therefore, it does not meet the criteria for a material name.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Taking advantage of this aggregation control approach , high - performance PSCs based on PffBT4T-2OD:PC71BM were fabricated affording a PCE of up to 10.8% .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| high-performance |
| a PCE of up to 10.8% |

Note: I have assumed that "PSCs" refers to "polymer solar cells" and "PffBT4T-2OD:PC71BM" refers to a specific type of material used in the construction of the solar cells. These assumptions are based on the context provided in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| a PCE of up to 10.8% |

Note: I have removed "high-performance" as it is a subjective term and not a specific value of a material property. "PCE" refers to "power conversion efficiency," which is a material property of solar cells. Therefore, "a PCE of up to 10.8%" is the only valid entity that clearly refers to the value of a material property in the original paragraph.
